Name: The Creature Zone VR
About the game: A 3-Part horror game about an experiment going on. you can play the three games in the story mode, vent run, terry's pizzeria, and missing friend. the game has features that include: physical hands, and much more! here are the synopsizes for each game: vent run is a game mode where you have to escape the vents of Terry's Pizzeria. Terry's Pizzeria is a game mode where you are positioned as the security guard of Terry's Pizzeria, but you slowly realize that the animatronics are actually the reason of the shutdown of Terry's Pizzeria. missing friend is a game mode of which you are in the also abandoned camp clearwater, you are surrounded by three extraterrestrial creatures, missing friend, party man, and salvage. You will have to play chronological order for the games. the physical hands mean that your VR hands are physics-based.
